agent-instructions.title: Agent Instructions Entry Point
agent-instructions.description: Entry point for agent instructions - load basic rules from Supabase

code-location-citations.title: Code Location Citations
code-location-citations.description: Require agents to cite concrete code locations that reviewers can verify quickly

code-citation-requirements.title: Code Citation Requirements
code-citation-requirements.description: Require agents to cite specific file paths and line numbers when referencing code locations

state-management-change-documentation.title: State Management Change Documentation
state-management-change-documentation.description: Require agents to document and justify any changes to application state management in review artifacts

key-decisions-summary.title: Key Decisions Summary Requirement
key-decisions-summary.description: Require agents to include a "Key decisions" summary in completion write-ups so reviewers can understand tradeoffs without re-reading entire worklogs

hidden-features-error-message-documentat.title: Hidden Features: Error Message Changes Must Be Documented
hidden-features-error-message-documentat.description: Require agents to document changes to error messages for hidden/locked/feature-flagged capabilities so future agents don't misinterpret them as product decisions
